```{r}
#| label: load-data-pkgs

safi_data <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-06-13/safi_data.csv')

library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```

```{r}
#| label: skim-data

skim(safi_data)
```

For the data skim, we see that the three different villages in the dataset. Let's see how the number of members in a household differ among the villages.

```{r}

safi_data %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = factor(village))) +
  geom_bar()

```
